sense.name: (cause to) undergo fermentation
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] FERMENT NP2 NP1 FERMENT
sense.examples: We fermented the grapes in stainless steel tanks at a very cool temperature to retain the fresh fruit aromas. The milk fermented and was transformed into a mass of micro-organisms that looked like tapioca but was actually kefir grains.

sense.name: (cause to) be agitated or excited
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] FERMENT NP2 NP1 FERMENT
sense.examples: Her mind ferments. Islam is fermenting Africa.
